section.title: Summary of Changes in GSI-OpenSSH
section.para: GT version contains GSI-OpenSSH version 4.7. GSI-OpenSSH clients now attempt only GSI authentication by default, rather than the confusing behavior of attempting other SSH authentication methods when GSI authentication fails. (The GSI-OpenSSH server still supports both GSI and non-GSI authentication methods by default, for compatibility with both GSI and non-GSI clients.) See the GSI-OpenSSH Release History for more details on this and other GSI-OpenSSH versions.
